snippet.title: Tommy Gun Witches - A whodunit with witches point and click adventure!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/tommy-gun-witches?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt A whodunit, with witches?! In Tommy Gun Witches, you play as a sentinel, a detective who investigates crimes committed by witches, gremlins, devils, you get the picture.

Witches were banished to another dimension, yet some have managed a surreptitious return. A recent murder oddly mirrors their distinctive methods, given the lingering scent of sulfuric acid at the crime scene. But why would anyone go after a mere filing clerk? Something doesn’t add up.

Step into the shoes of one cynical sentinel, Lucas Barber,  who works under his even more jaded boss, the chief inspector. Your task? Unravel the threads of this enigmatic murder puzzle: who is the culprit behind the filing clerk's demise, and what lies behind the sinister deed?

Tommy Gun Witches is a short point and click adventure that incorporates elements of narrative fiction, walking simulator, and visual novel genres. The focus is on character interactions, dialogues, exploration, with  puzzles used mainly to support the narrative and punctuate the pacing. A retro adventure with pixel-art graphics, what more is there to want, really?
